name: Objon (WIP)
description:
This is extremely not finished, just keeping it public so that I can test how my WebGL builds are working on various devices. Feel free to have a play if you want!

Controls:
Left/Right or A/D to run
W or Down to crouch
A or Up to climb
Space to jump
X or F to kick
Z/C or Q/E to dash left/right

Known issues:
The main menu layout is borked on desktop
The sound mix is bad and the volume controls don't work
The drillbot at the end has teleportation powers
The level is unfinished
Most of the game is missing
